name: Goose work
description:
OMG 11 VIEWS

A game about geese without necks and weird names.

Play 10 days in a hotel with geese who want to scare you. Inspiration by five night at freddy

Credits in game.

Don't listen to the secrets. All they do is make a confusing story because I am bad at making stories.

Mobile very much allowed, but computer reccomended to 100% the game.
